Title: Sowore slams police as hoodlums attack women protesters in Kwara govt house
Summary: Omoyele Sowore condemned the attack on women and children . Women and children staged a peaceful protest at the Kwara State Government House over rising cases of kidnapping and insecurity in their community .

Title: Turmoil looms in Kwankwasiyya movement as Gov Yusuf prepares to join APC
Summary: Turmoil looms in Kwankwasiyya movement as Gov Yusuf prepares to join APC . Governor Abba Kabiru Yusuf of Kano State and his political godfather are set to fall apart over the defection .

Title: SGF Akume hosts son’s wedding to Atoga’s daughter
Summary: SGF Akume hosted the wedding of his son, Samuel Aondoakura Akume, to Deborah Ershima, daughter of Engineer Msula Atoga, in Makurdi, the Benue State capital . The event followed a visit by Senator George Akume to his son's family .

Title: DSS arrests suspects linked to 2023 abduction, killing of Calabar neurologist
Summary: DSS arrests two men alleged to be key members of gang responsible for 2023 abduction and killing of Professor Ekanem Philip Ephraim, a neurologist in Calabar, Cross River State .

Title: Three dead as youths, security operatives clash in Katsina
Summary: Trouble began on December 27 at about 10 pm, when police tried to arrest youths suspected of being social miscreants . Three people dead and several others injured in Katsina State metropolitan area .

Title: Let us make right decision against 2027, Wike warns PDP
Summary: The minister made the appeal on Monday during a media interaction at his office in Port Harcourt, the Rivers State capital, where he expressed concern over the party’s prolonged internal instability . Wike warned that failure to do so could cost the party its chances of winning major political offices .

Title: EPL: Ex-Tottenham Hotspur player backs Man City to win Premier League title
Summary: Jamie O’Hara believes Manchester City will win the Premier League title . The former Tottenham midfielder says he is not convinced by Arsenal's credentials . O'Hara questioned whether Mikel Arteta's side has the consistency and experience required to outlast Pep Guardiola’s Manchester City .

Title: Wike dismisses allegations of ‘secret’ support for Tinubu
Summary: Minister of the Federal Capital Territory, Nyesom Wike, has denied claims that he is secretly supporting President Bola Tinubu . Wike said his political stance has always been public and consistent . Comments attributed to Rivers State Governor, Siminalayi Fubara, who suggested that some politicians were engaging in “secret

Title: UK health authorities caution over unsafe online weight-loss products
Summary: Medicines and Healthcare products Regulatory Agency in the UK has issued urgent warnings to the public against buying weight-loss medicines from unregulated online sources in the New Year (2026) Health Minister Dr Zubir Ahmed and the MHRA in a press release on its website, issued the directive .

Title: APC faults opposition’s criticisms of Tinubu Europe trip
Summary: The All Progressives Congress has urged opposition parties to raise the quality of their engagement and stop “meaningless noise-making” over President Bola Tinubu’s trip to Europe . The APC made the call in a statement issued on Monday in Lagos by its Lagos State Spokesman, Seye
